title: reconnect issue; outcome of last ranked game
body:
hi,

just wondering if everyone who was in a ranked game that ended up with the issues from today will get the LP from the match? i was actually in a promo game and won, and i would have been promoted. but it is showing up as i havent been promoted :( will there be a solution to this riot ?

replies.body: same issue here, im suppose to be 2-0 in promos right now
